arts.ttl: Milan Player Ratings vs Bologna: Sluggish Rossoneri Beaten Again
arts.sum: Milan suffered another forgettable defeat as fellow European hopefuls Bologna came from behind to win 2-1 at Stadio Renato Dall'Ara. Sergio Conceicao got the taste of his own medicine, with the Rossoneri throwing away a halftime lead in a second consecutive Serie A loss. The post Milan Player Ratings vs Bologna: Sluggish Rossoneri Beaten Again appeared first on The Cult of Calcio.
